# Edward N. Gadsby

|birth_place  = North Adams, Massachusetts, U.S.
|death_date   =
|death_place  = Boston, Massachusetts, U.S.
|party        =
|alma_mater   = Amherst College  New York University School of Law
|restingplace       =
|spouse             = Isabelle Halsey
|relations          =
|children           = 2
|occupation         = Lawyer and appointed United States government official
|religion           =
}}
Edward N. Gadsby  served as chairman of the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission between 1957 and 1961.
Further reading
*[https://web.archive.org/web/20090202162137/http://dlib.nyu.edu/findingaids/html/archives/gadsby_content.html Guide to the Papers of Edward N. Gadsby: 1956-1973] New York University Archives
*[https://www.sec.gov/news/digest/1957/dig082057.pdf SEC News Digest August 20, 1957]
